headline: Occidental Petroleum Corporation (OXY) Joins Hands with ADNOC to Develop Texas Direct Air Capture Hub
summary: It was recently revealed that Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) has formed an agreement with UAE’s ADNOC for the development of a direct air capture facility in South Texas. Let us shed some light on this development. Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) is one of the largest oil and gas producers in the United States, including a […]

headline: Oman extends exploration and production agreement with Occidental Petroleum
summary: Oman's energy and mineralsministry has amended and extended an exploration and productionagreement for Block 53 with U.S. company Occidental Petroleumuntil 2050, Oman News Agency reported on...
